text:
I'll soon be sharing video SEO audits for sites that need an improvement in terms of organic traffic acquisition.

Recommendations will be based on impact & chances to be implemented (AKA: your resources).

You can watch your own site reviewed.

If you are interested in your site to be - free of charge - reviewed, video shared and:
- your site attracts 1,000+ unique organic users per month
- you don't get the results you were expecting or want to improve
- you've challenges you're not able to overcome

Please fill the form (or share it with someone you think can benefit):

<https://www.betakrea.net/video-review>

attachments.fallback: Google Docs: Video SEO Audit request
attachments.title: Video SEO Audit request
attachments.text: I will share with you and publish a 10-20 minutes video describing challenges and opportunities for your site. This is an application for a free of charge SEO review that can outline the most important issues for your site. This is *not* a full, comprensive SEO audit. Please note that completing this form does not guarantee the audit to be delivered.

text:
:leaves:Hello Everyone, Are you eager about the latest EdTech Trends? Have you figured out who the big players are and what the current trends are?
A lot is going on in the EdTech world right now. Indeed, as the ecosystem develops, there are numerous parallels to the FinTech business technologies. Incubators, startups, thought leaders, and rising trends abound in the educational technology industry.
Read our latest post and learn more: <https://daninstitute.com/blog/edtech-trends-you-must-look-out/>

attachments.fallback: DAN Institute: EdTech Trends You Must Look Out For In 2021 And Beyond

text: Hey folks! We just launched a new post for people considering going the freelance route. It's long, but we interviewed several freelancers who have done it -- some while still moonlighting, some who have gone full-time, and all of it includes stuff they wish they would have known. Would love feedback and thoughts on it! <https://marketerhire.com/blog/becoming-a-freelancer>

attachments.title: How to Become a Freelancer, According to 3 Successful Freelancers
attachments.text: Freelancing has become increasingly popular during the Great Resignation, but how exactly do full-time employees make the jump to freelance? We asked three successful freelancers about the necessary steps you need to take to become a freelancer.
attachments.fallback: How to Become a Freelancer, According to 3 Successful Freelancers

elements.text: Hey folks! We just launched a new post for people considering going the freelance route.
